queue.title: Queue Name
queue.description: name of queue of associated task

taskId.title: Task ID
taskId.description: id of associated task in queue

failures.title: Failures
failures.description: number of failed attempts to process this message

createdTime.title: Created Time
createdTime.description: time when this messages was created

updatedTime.title: Updated Time
updatedTime.description: time when this messages was last updated

scheduledTime.title: Scheduled Time
scheduledTime.description: time when next attempt to process this messages is scheduled

processingStartTime.title: Processing Start Time
processingStartTime.description: time when last attempt to process this messages started

processingEndTime.title: Processing End Time
processingEndTime.description: time when last attempt to process this messages finished

errorMessage.title: Error Message
errorMessage.description: error message of last failed attempt to process this message

outcomeMessage.title: Outcome Message
outcomeMessage.description: outcome message of process this message
